ema athadanguwata ganimata hethu kisiwak iridipath nokara thibini.nithignya hijas hisbulla mahatha athadanguwata gath dinata pasuda enam aprel 15 wanida madhya hamuwak pawathwamin polis madhya prakashakawaraya pasku dina ella karana lada thrastha praharaya sambandhayen sakapita thama sewadayakaya athadanguwata gath bawa prakasha kara thibini.eeta amatharawa ehidi madhyawediyeku yomu kala prashnayakata pilithuru demin polis madhya prakashakawaraya kiya sitiye nithipathi upades nomathiwa me siddhiya sambandhayen nithignya hisbulla mahatha athulu sakakaruwan athadanguwata gath bawaya.

hadisi awasthawala di amathum ganima, keti paniwida yomu kirima ho laba ganima, ji. pi. es. thakshanaya thulin daruwan sitina sthanaya dana ganima yana mulika awashyatha udesa pamanak mema durakathana nirmanaya kere.

thri roda ratha riyadurekuta riwolwarayakin wedi thaba ghathanaya kala bawata anuradhapura mahadhikaranaya hamuwe adhi chodana laba siti hitapu polis kosthapalwarayeku ema chodanawata waradakaru bawa nigamanaya karamin uthuru mada palath bada mahadhikarana winisuru sunanda kumara rathnayaka mahatha ohuta eeye (17) marana danduwama niyama kaleya.mese marana danduwama niyama wuye hitapu polis kosthapalwarayeku wana anuradhapura padinchi werahara appuhamilage nirmala piyathissa namaththatayi.withthikaru wisin 2005 wasare sapthambar masa 16 wana dina ho eeta aasanna dinaka di anuradhapura polis wasame anuradhapura parani bas nawathumpala idiripita di chandra kumarage samanthajith nayanapi‡∑äraya yana ayata riwolwarayakin wedithaba mara damu bawata nithipathiwaraya wisin lanka danda nithi sangrahaye 296 weni waganthiya yatathe withthikaruta erehiwa anuradhapura mahadhikaranaya hamuwe adhi chodana gonukara thibuni.withthikaru wisin 2009.09.16 wana dina anuradhapura parani nagarayata pamina parani nagaraya idiripita thriroda ratha gale thriroda ratha riyadureku washayen sewaya kala daksha karate kridakayaku wu maranakaruta wedi thaba ghathanaya kara pala gos sitiya di anuradhapura mulasthana polisiye aparadha wimarshana anshaya mangin athadanguwata gena thibuni.withthikaru anuradhapura mahadhikaranaya hamuwe wibhaga wana nadu kihipayakama adhichodana laba sitinneku wana athara, ohu danatath aparadhayak sambandhayen waradakaru wi sira daduwam widimin sitinneki..
